name: FireBoard-CloudConnectedSmartThermometer
0:
”Alexa, ask FireBoard temperature”
”Alexa, ask FireBoard to set an alert for 200 degrees on channel 1”
”Alexa, ask FireBoard to set my smoker to 225 degrees”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: fireboard
des:
Ask Alexa for the temperature of your beef brisket, filet mignon, or any other food you may be cooking up on the grill or in the kitchen. In addition, if you are a FireBoard Drive user, ask Alexa to "set my smoker to 225 degrees" or "turn my fan off". With our cloud connected smart thermometer, the FireBoard, you won't have to smudge your phone with greasy fingers or run to the grill to check your temperatures.. just ask Alexa!

Get your FireBoard today at www.fireboard.com. Using your FireBoard account, you can link this skill to your Echo through the Alexa app.

More details on FireBoard can be found at www.fireboard.com

*This Alexa Skill may not be suitable for all ages.
